articles.description: The last time the Nifty 50 index gained for four straight F&O series' was back in December 2016 to May 2017, when it gained for six straight series'.

articles.title: Adani Group companies gain Rs 50,000 crore in m-cap - Economic Times
articles.description: ​​Adani Green jumped 10%, emerging as the biggest gainer among the group companies. Adani Power gained 9.2%, while ACC, Adani Total Gas, Ambuja Cements, Adani Wilmar and NDTV rose 4-5% each.
